thread.title: Trump Gets Slammed by Left for Golfing, but Here’s How He Differs From Obama
thread.title_full: Trump Gets Slammed by Left for Golfing, but Here’s How He Differs From Obama

author: Kim Smith
title: Trump Gets Slammed by Left for Golfing, but Here’s How He Differs From Obama
text:
FOUND: Guide to Disrupting Democracy Was Published by Obama-Tied Group 
Trump is working to clean up the mess former Obama left him. 
For example, he withdrew the U.S. from the Trans Pacific Partnership , he put construction of a southern border wall in motion, he ordered a hiring freeze on federal hiring other than for the military and public safety jobs. In addition, he began the repeal of Obamacare, ended federal funding to sanctuary cities and states and moved forward on the Dakota Access and Keystone oil pipelines. 
And that’s not all of the things he’s accomplished so far. Advertisement – story continues below 
Of course Democrats are going to slam Trump for golfing. They will criticize everything he does, but no one can accuse him of being a slacker. 
Democrats and those who have been against Trump since the beginning will try, however. We shouldn’t expect them to ever recognize anything positive Trump has ever done or will ever do. 
It’s going to be a long four years for them.
